title: Kim Kintziger
text:
Kim Kintziger (born 2 April 1987) is a <a href="Luxembourg">Luxembourg</a>ian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player, who currently plays for <a href="FC%20Mondercange">FC Mondercange</a> in the <a href="Luxembourg%201.%20Division">Luxembourg 1. Division</a>.
Club career.
Kintziger started his career at <a href="Swift%20Hesperange">Swift Hesperange</a> and joined Differdange in summer 2007.
International career.
He made his debut for <a href="Luxembourg%20national%20football%20team">Luxembourg</a> in an October 2005 World Cup qualification match against <a href="Estonia%20national%20football%20team">Estonia</a> and by November 2009 had earned 33 caps, scoring 1 goal. He played in 10 <a href="FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification">FIFA World Cup qualification</a> matches and 10 Uefa European Cup qualification matches.
He scored his first international goal in a friendly against Iceland on the 14-11-2009. The game finished 1:1.
